enabling_node_inclusion: Kunna yanayin haɗa kumburi, da fatan za a jira...
enabling_node_exclusion: Kunna yanayin keɓe kumburi, da fatan za a jira...
inclusion_message: Danna maɓallin kan na'urar da kake son ƙarawa zuwa wannan hanyar sadarwa.
exclusion_message: Danna maɓallin kan na'urar da kake son cirewa daga wannan hanyar sadarwa.
task_duration_notice: Wannan aikin na iya ɗaukar daƙiƙa _HG_PLACEHOLDER_0__ don kammalawa.
adding_node: Ƙara na'ura {{node}} , da fatan za a jira...
removing_node: Ana cire na'urar {{node}} , da fatan za a jira...
association_description: Wannan na'urorin suna aika rahotanni zuwa nodes ɗin da ke cikin ƙungiyoyin ƙungiyoyi. Domin karɓar rahotanni daga wannan na'urar, haɗa node 1 (mai sarrafawa) a cikin ƙungiyoyin ƙungiyoyi.
generic_parameter_description: Shigar da lambar sigar daidaitawa da ƙimar da za a saita.
calibration_parameter_not_set: Ba a saita lambar ma'auni ba
